talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lucky Refugee$
Despite everything, I was lucky that day.
If it weren't for you happening to pass by, I would have died!

$Lucky Refugee$
Oh my, what are the chances of running into you here?
It is a pleasure to see you again, my savior. Though I'm in no position
to do so at the moment, I really want to repay you someday!
